pack

Class ActivityList

  • java.lang.Object
    • pack.ActivityList

  • public class ActivityList
extends java.lang.Object
    The ActivityList Class is the Model of the Carbon Impact Application Program that processes a list of activity objects and operates on them using various methods to update/add/remove the activities.
    Since:
    18/03/2020
    Author:
    Justas Cepaitis * @version 1.0

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<lib.Activity> getActivities()
      This method returns an ArrayList containing activity objects.
      java.lang.String getActivitiesByActivity()
      This method returns a string of activities from activityList sorted by their names and separated by a \n.
      java.lang.String getActivitiesByDate()
      This method returns a string of activities from activityList sorted by their dates and separated by a \n.
      java.lang.String getActivitiesText()
      This method returns a string of activities from activityList separated by a \n.
      lib.Activity getActivity(int week, java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String name, int points)
      This method returns an activity corresponding to the parameters passed to the method by constructing a new activity out of the parameters.
      lib.Activity getActivityByIndex(int index)
      This method returns the activity at the specified index.
      int getTotalPoints(int week)
      This method returns the total points of a week of activities in the activityList.
      int getTotalPointsOfAllWeeks()
      This method returns the sum of all points of all activities in the activityList.
      void removeActivity(int Week, java.time.LocalDate Date, java.lang.String Name, int Points)
      This method searches through the array activityList removes an activity from activityList which corresponds to the parameters passed.
      void setActivitiesFromFile(java.util.ArrayList<lib.Activity> importedActivityList)
      This method sets the list of activities to the contents of the ArrayList received as a parameter.
      void setActivity(int week, java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String name, int points)
      This method creates a new activity using the parameters passed to it and adds the activity passed to it to the ArrayList activityList.

        public void setActivity(int week,
                        java.time.LocalDate date,
                        java.lang.String name,
                        int points)
        This method creates a new activity using the parameters passed to it and adds the activity passed to it to the ArrayList activityList.
        Parameters:
        week. - Week of activity
        date. - Date of activity
        name. - Name of activity
        points. - Points of activity

      • getActivity

        public lib.Activity getActivity(int week,
                                java.time.LocalDate date,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                int points)
        This method returns an activity corresponding to the parameters passed to the method by constructing a new activity out of the parameters.
        Parameters:
        week. - Week of activity
        date. - Date of activity
        name. - Name of activity
        points. - Points of activity
        Returns:
